title: Halloween 2019: Cardi B hits stage with Offset in sexy nurse costume
text:
Look at how cute they are (Picture: Getty)

Cardi B was channeling her inner nurse as she opted for sexy over scary in a racy nurse’s outfit for Halloween, as she took to the stage in New Jersey with husband Offset.

The singer wore a skintight mini white nurse’s outfit, complete with a hat and stethoscope.

She wore a bright red wig that brought her hair down to her waist, matching her thigh-high PVC boots and crimson lips.

Cardi looked like she was having a ball on stage with her hubby, where she performed a slew of bangers.

We’re feeling the red theme here Cardi (Picture: MediaPunch)

This comes after the 27-year-old rapper took to Turks and Caicos to celebrate her birthday with her beau earlier this month.

The Bodak Yellow rapper jetted off to the exotic Caribbean island with a group of friends, where she took a dip in the pool and showcased her twerking skills on Instagram.

Cardi and Offset appear to be stronger than ever despite having broken up in December last year following reports of Offset’s infidelity.

lot of singers are gearing up to party for Halloween (Picture: Backgrid)

Following the split, the Migos rapper issued a very public apology to the rapper, begging her to take him back amid claims that he tried to organise a threesome with two other women.

In an Instagram video, Offset, real name Kiari Kendrell Cephus, said: ‘I only got one birthday wish and that’s to get my wife back Cardi.

‘We’re going through a lot of things right now, a lot of things in the media. I want to apologise to you Cardi. I embarrassed you. I made you look crazy.’

He went on to admit that he was ‘partaking in activity that I shouldn’t have been partaking in,’ and apologised.

Two months later in February, the two rappers reunited.

Cardi isn’t the only one to opt for sexy this Halloween; Liz Hurley dressed as Uma Therman’s character, The Bride, in Kill Bill, whilst Demi Lovato went straight up period drama as she dressed in a cleavage-happy Marie Antoinette dress.
